attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Taxpayers are under a huge burden to keep this country afloat and we are seeing hikes and new taxes introduced at every opportunity to support freeloaders, government mistakes all under the guise of safety (speed cameras aka revenue collectors), climate change (fuel duty, road tax, insurance tax, congestion charging, work place parking levy, airport taxes etc etc)and anything else they can think of to tax us on that we are not paying enough on already.
Stop the nonsense and stop it now before we our country collapses under the strain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
